findings.title: Centralization
findings.description: The mint function of the CDzToken contract allows the owner to mint an unrestricted amount of tokens to anyone at any time.

findings.title: Using SafeMath in solidity >0.8
findings.description: Using SafeMath in solidity version 0.8 and later is unnecessary as math operations are already checked for overflow and underflow.

findings.title: Public function that could be declared external
findings.description: public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.
